text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Gimlet…… I am sorry. I didn't mean to, but… I saw that…

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph. It's nothing but Fortuna's whimsy…… There's no need to worry about it.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Nevertheless, that is top secret. I'll allow you to keep it locked inside your heart only.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Top secret…… Understood. 
I give you my word.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I won't tell anyone…… the truth 
about…… your right eye.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's how it should be…… 
The moon shines magnificently only 
because of it's unseen Privolva.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I understand. But I think… your right
eye……

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: No…… Hah…… Ahahahahaha!!! Is that it, is that how you deem my sealed shadow……!! How entertaining!!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Do you think so? Then I am… glad.
